name: MemoRawr
description:
This is my entry for AGDG's Dinosaur Jam. It's a very simple game but I hope you'll have some fun with it.

In this Memory/Matching game clone, you find pairs of dinosaurs. The dinosaurs in the top section of the screen are running away from the meteorite that will kill them. When you find a pair, the corresponding dinosaur will sprint ahead to safety. The goal is of course to find all the pairs and save all the dinos.
